name: Audio Trimmer
description: Simple online tool to trim audio files. Upload your audio, select the part you want to keep, and download the trimmed file. Supports MP3, WAV, and other formats.
coreTask: Trim and cut audio files online

name: CSVJSON
description: Online tool for converting between CSV, JSON, and SQL formats. Also includes data cleaning and transformation utilities. All processing happens in the browser.
coreTask: Convert between CSV, JSON, and SQL data formats

name: Can I Use
description: Up-to-date browser support tables for web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, SVG, and JavaScript APIs. Essential reference for web developers.
coreTask: Check browser compatibility for web technologies

name: Carbon
description: Create and share beautiful images of your source code. Choose from dozens of syntax themes, languages, and export to PNG or SVG.
coreTask: Generate beautiful images of source code snippets

name: Compound Interest Calculator
description: Official SEC compound interest calculator. Estimate how your savings or investments could grow over time with compound interest. Simple, trustworthy, no ads.
coreTask: Calculate compound interest growth on savings and investments

name: Convertio
description: Advanced online file converter supporting 300+ formats. Convert documents, images, audio, video, ebooks, archives, and more with a simple drag-and-drop interface.
coreTask: Convert files between 300+ formats with drag and drop

name: Desmos
description: Advanced graphing calculator implemented as an interactive web application. Plot functions, create tables, add sliders, animate graphs, and explore math visually.
coreTask: Graph mathematical functions and explore equations visually

name: DevDocs
description: Combines multiple API documentations in a fast, organized, and searchable interface. Covers JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node.js, Ruby, Python, and hundreds more.
coreTask: Search and browse developer documentation for hundreds of APIs

name: Dillinger
description: Cloud-enabled, mobile-ready, offline-storage compatible Markdown editor. Preview rendered Markdown in real-time as you type.
coreTask: Write and preview Markdown documents with live rendering

name: Excalidraw
description: Virtual whiteboard for sketching hand-drawn like diagrams. Supports real-time collaboration, export to PNG/SVG, and has a library of shapes and icons.
coreTask: Create hand-drawn style diagrams and sketches collaboratively

name: GeoGebra
description: Free dynamic mathematics software for all levels of education. Combine geometry, algebra, spreadsheets, graphing, statistics, and calculus in one interactive tool.
coreTask: Explore geometry, algebra, and calculus with interactive math tools

name: Have I Been Pwned
description: Check if your email address or phone number has been compromised in a data breach. Covers billions of records from known breaches and pastes.
coreTask: Check if your email or phone was exposed in data breaches

name: Hemingway Editor
description: Writing assistant that highlights complex sentences, passive voice, adverbs, and hard-to-read phrases. Helps make your writing bold and clear.
coreTask: Improve writing clarity by highlighting complex and hard-to-read text

name: JSON Crack
description: Visualize JSON data into interactive graphs. Seamlessly explore complex JSON structures with a tree-like graph view, search, and filter capabilities.
coreTask: Visualize JSON data as interactive node graphs

name: JSON Formatter
description: Online JSON formatter, validator, and viewer. Paste or upload JSON data to format, validate, minify, and convert between JSON and other formats.
coreTask: Format, validate, and beautify JSON data

name: Jitsi Meet
description: Free, open-source video conferencing that works directly in your browser. Create a room and share the link — no account, download, or plugin needed.
coreTask: Start instant video calls without accounts or downloads

name: LanguageTool
description: Multilingual grammar, style, and spell checker that supports over 30 languages. Detects errors that simple spell checkers cannot find.
coreTask: Check grammar, spelling, and style in 30+ languages

name: Omni Calculator
description: Collection of over 3,000 free calculators for math, physics, finance, health, and everyday life. Each calculator explains the formulas and concepts behind it.
coreTask: Calculate anything with 3,000+ specialized calculators

name: PDF24 Tools
description: Free and easy-to-use online PDF tools: merge, split, compress, convert, rotate, watermark, and more. All processing happens in the browser.
coreTask: Merge, split, compress, and convert PDF files

name: Photopea
description: Advanced online image editor that supports PSD, XCF, Sketch, XD, and CDR formats. Works like Photoshop directly in your browser with layers, filters, and advanced editing tools.
coreTask: Edit photos and design graphics in a Photoshop-like browser editor

name: Pomofocus
description: Customizable Pomodoro timer that works on desktop and mobile. Track your focus sessions, set custom durations, and manage tasks with a clean interface.
coreTask: Time your work sessions using the Pomodoro technique

name: PrivacyTests
description: Open-source tests of web browser privacy. Compares tracking protection, fingerprinting resistance, and other privacy features across major browsers.
coreTask: Compare web browser privacy features and tracking protection

name: Regex101
description: Online regex tester and debugger for PHP, PCRE, Python, Golang, and JavaScript. Build, test, and debug regex patterns with real-time explanation and match highlighting.
coreTask: Build, test, and debug regular expressions with real-time feedback

name: SVG Edit
description: Fast, web-based, JavaScript-driven SVG drawing editor. Create and edit SVG images directly in the browser with a familiar drawing application interface.
coreTask: Create and edit SVG vector graphics in the browser

name: Squoosh
description: Google-built image compression tool that runs entirely in the browser. Compare original vs compressed side-by-side, supports WebP, AVIF, MozJPEG, and more.
coreTask: Compress and optimize images with visual quality comparison

name: TableConvert
description: Convert between table formats: Excel, CSV, JSON, HTML, SQL, Markdown, LaTeX, and more. Edit tables visually and export in your preferred format.
coreTask: Convert tables between Excel, CSV, JSON, Markdown, and more

name: Temp Mail
description: Disposable temporary email service. Get an instant anonymous email address to receive emails without revealing your real address. Auto-deletes after a period.
coreTask: Generate disposable email addresses for anonymous sign-ups

name: TinyWow
description: Collection of free online tools for PDF, video, image, and file conversion. Files are deleted after processing. No watermarks or file size limits.
coreTask: Convert and process PDFs, images, videos, and documents

name: Wise Currency Converter
description: Currency converter showing the real, mid-market exchange rate. Compare rates from banks and transfer services to see how much you could save.
coreTask: Compare real exchange rates across banks and services

name: WolframAlpha
description: Computational knowledge engine that answers factual questions by computing answers from structured data. Covers math, science, geography, history, and more.
coreTask: Compute answers and solve math problems step by step

name: XE Currency Converter
description: World-trusted currency converter with live exchange rates. Convert between 300+ currencies and precious metals with mid-market rates updated every minute.
coreTask: Convert currencies with live mid-market exchange rates

name: ezGIF
description: Online GIF maker and image editor. Create, resize, crop, reverse, optimize GIFs, and convert video to GIF. Also supports WebP, APNG, and AVIF.
coreTask: Create, edit, and optimize GIFs and animated images

name: led.run
description: A browser-based display toolkit that turns any screen into a LED sign, light effect, sound visualizer, clock, QR code, or camera filter. Supports dozens of themes and modes — no app, no account, just a URL.
coreTask: Display scrolling text, light effects, sound visualizers, clocks, QR codes, and camera filters — all directly in the browser without any login or account

name: nologin.tools
description: A curated directory of tools and services that work without creating an account or logging in. Browse, search, and filter tools by category, privacy, pricing, and more — all without registration.
coreTask: Browse and search the full directory of no-login tools, filter by category and tags, view tool details

name: remove.bg
description: AI-powered tool that automatically removes backgrounds from photos in seconds. Upload an image and get a transparent PNG instantly.
coreTask: Remove image backgrounds automatically using AI

name: til.re
description: A URL-based time tool that lets you create countdowns, countups, clocks, and recurring cycles — all embedded in the link itself. No signup required, just craft your URL and share it. Supports multiple themes and time units.
coreTask: Create and share countdown timers, countup timers, and clocks via URL — no account needed

name: tldraw
description: A collaborative digital whiteboard with a clean, minimal interface. Draw freehand, add shapes, arrows, text, and sticky notes to create diagrams and visual notes.
coreTask: Draw diagrams and visual notes on an infinite canvas

name: tmp.tf
description: A temporary clipboard tool that lets you sync text and content across devices in seconds. No signup required, end-to-end encrypted, and content auto self-destructs. Simply open a named channel and paste from any device.
coreTask: Open a channel and sync text across devices without any account or login
